function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Ineffective contact tracing systems","Impact":"Uncontrolled spread of contagious diseases, such as COVID-19","Mitigation":"Improving contact tracing protocols and technology-assisted tracking","Technologies":"IoT-enabled testing and tracing, visitor tracking, monitoring","People":"General public, healthcare workers, government officials","Owner":"Government, healthcare organizations, technology companies"},{"Description":"Failure to adopt IoT for test and trace applications","Impact":"Uncontrolled transmission of COVID-19 and other contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Encouraging adoption of IoT-enabled testing and tracing, providing support and resources for implementation","Technologies":"IoT-enabled testing and tracing","People":"General public, healthcare workers, government officials","Owner":"Government, healthcare organizations, technology companies"},{"Description":"Lack of technological infrastructure for effective test and trace applications","Impact":"Inability to contain and mitigate the spread of COVID-19 and other contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Investing in and developing the necessary technological infrastructure, providing training and resources for implementation","Technologies":"IoT-enabled testing and tracing, visitor tracking, monitoring","People":"General public, healthcare workers, government officials","Owner":"Government, technology companies"}]}
